name: ImMutagen
description:
The Mission was a failure, and you are all that is left.

Trek across the ever-shifting floors of Hell, and fight against the mutated corpses of your squad, as you track down your Unit's Flag, in this shmup-like Mutant Roguelike. 

Developers note: The game is finished content wise, but I may come back to fix any bugs with the game, if they come up. Any ways, Have fun!
